name: ERC20FeeProxy
description: ERC20FeeProxy. This contract performs an ERC20 token transfer, with a Fee sent to a third address and stores a reference.

eventDecorators.name: TransferWithReferenceAndFee
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the implementation contract has been swapped. Event that is fired each time someone harvests the strat.

functionDecorators.name: transferFromWithReferenceAndFee
functionDecorators.description: Performs a ERC20 token transfer with a reference and a transfer to a second address for the payment of a fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ERC20 token smart contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the payment fee.
